wikipedia_page.main: Mary Teresa Josephine Webber,  is a British palaeographer, medievalist, and academic. She has been a Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge since 1997 and Professor of Palaeography at the Faculty of History, University of Cambridge since 2018. Webber studied Modern History as an undergraduate at Somerville College, Oxford.

response: *Teresa Webber, British palaeographer, medievalist, and academic
